title: Bug 16549Cannot navigate tabbed notebook with keyboard
description: Bug 16549Cannot navigate tabbed notebook with keyboard This does work on WindowsSTEPS1) Open a tabbed notebook on Windows 2000.2) Tab until you get focus on the tab3) Hit the right arrowit will go to the next tab\4) Open a tabbed notebook on Linux motif5) Tab until you get focus on the tab6) Hit the right arrownothing will happen
OB: On Linux motif you cannot switch between tabs of a tabbed notebook using thekeyboard only.
